title: Germany awards $1.9 billion SAR satellite deal to Rheinmetall-Iceye venture
description:
New constellation would provide security for NATO’s eastern flank, German brigade in Lithuania

The post Germany awards $1.9 billion SAR satellite deal to Rheinmetall-Iceye venture appeared first on SpaceNews.
